product_name: Native Eyewear Bomber Polarized Reflex Sunglasses - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Ideal for large and extra-large faces, the Native Eyewear Bomber Polarized Reflex Sunglasses provide protection from sunny skies and glare on sand, snow, apshalt and water. Polarized Crystal Carbonate(R) (P.C.C.) lenses use a protective coating to protect against scratching; lenses are removable so you can switch according to conditions. N3(TM) polarized lenses block 40% of infrared light, decreasing eye fatigue; lenses offer blue light filtering and 100% UV protection to minimize haze and enhance clarity. Lightweight yet durable Rhyno-Tuff(R) thermoplastic frames are built to withstand high-velocity impact. Venting system incorporated into the frames enhances airflow and virtually eliminates fog and condensation. Self-adjusting nosepads and ear stems create a nonslip grip that keeps sunglasses in place. Cam-action spring hinges quickly lock temples into position. Closeout.
short_description: Ideal for large and extra-large faces, the Native Eyewear Bomber Polarized Reflex Sunglasses provide protection from sunny skies and glare on sand, snow, apshalt and water.
